Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of environmental protection to post a map of green roofs online

Items.MatterName: Education and outreach regarding solar and green roof requirements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of environmental protection to report on its progress toward decreasing the presence of sewage and stormwater contaminants in the city waterways and various strategies to achieve those goals, and providing for the expiration and repeal of such requirement
Items.MatterName: Requiring DEP to report on its progress toward decreasing the presence of sewage and stormwater contaminants in the city waterways and various strategies to achieve those goals, and providing for the expiration and repeal of such requirement.

Items.MatterName: Studying the feasibility of implementing solar-ready measures for commercial buildings.

Items.MatterName: Pilot program to reduce emissions from city-owned motor vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to an annual report on drainage infrastructure
